name: Mosquito Shield Wilderness Formula Travel Size 100ml
description: From the backyard BBQ to sub-Saharan Africa, biting insects range from a nuisance to a health risk. Get up to 8 hours of protection with the highest percentage of DEET allowed in Canada.Lasts for up to 8 hours.Contains 30% DEET.Effective against: mosquitoes, black flies, biting midges, deer flies, stable flies, ticks and chiggers.100ml pump spray can be carried in your carry-on.Pump spray uses no aerosol propellants.
